Choose another view angle above<br><i>or:
Choose another view angle above
or use CTRL + mouse button
or drag the compass needle at the bottom left of the map
draw-help-selected-point:
click on trash can to remove
move the selected point to a new location
click on another point to select it
click on 'point', 'line' or 'shape' to draw a new element
click on ⋮ for a new map layer or layer properties
draw-help-selected-non-point:
click on trash can to remove
click again on {{definitearticleelement}} to edit shape
click on a {{otherelement}} to select {{referelement}}
click on 'point', 'line' or 'shape' to draw a new element
click on ⋮ for a new map layer or layer properties
draw-help-select-element:
click on {{indefinitearticleelement}} to select
click on 'point', 'line' or 'shape' to draw a new element
click on ⋮ for a new map layer or layer properties
draw-help-edit-point:
click on trash can to remove point
move the selected point to a new location
click on the small point between 2 points to add a point
click on 'point', 'line' or 'shape' to draw a new element
click on ⋮ for a new map layer or layer properties
draw-help-edit-element:
click on point to move
click on the small point between 2 points to add a point
click on a {{otherelement}} to select {{referelement}}
click on 'point', 'line' or 'shape' to draw a new element
click on ⋮ for a new map layer or layer properties
draw-help-point:
click on the map to add a point
hold [ALT] to disable the snap function
click on 'select' to edit an existing point
click on ⋮ for a new map layer or layer properties
draw-help-line:
click on the map to add a line
click again on the endpoint or [ENTER] to complete the line
hold [ALT] to disable the snap function
click on 'select' to edit an existing line
click on ⋮ for a new map layer or layer properties
draw-help-polygon:
click on the map to add an shape
hold [ALT] to disable the snap function
click again on the last added point or [ENTER] to complete the shape
click on 'select' to edit an existing shape
click on ⋮ for a new map layer or layer properties
Click on the map to measure distance or: Click on the map to measure distance or area
Click a map element for info on that ele: Click a map element for info on that element
no info available for this location: no info available for this location
name: name
